idea-plugin.name: emacsIDEAs
idea-plugin.description:
Porting some great extensions of emacs to Intellij IDEA. such as AceJump, CopyWithoutSelectAction.

AceJump:

  • C-i 't' 'm' : Basic Jump | Type C-i, then type target char (e.g. 't') to jump to, then type marker char (e.g. 'm') to move caret.
  • C-i ' ' 'm' : Jump to line end or start. | To show marker on line end and line start, type space ' ' as target char
  • C-i ',' 'm' : Jump to symbol key | Show markers on .{}(|`/\;.{}()[]?_=-+'"!@#$%^&*)_=

AceJump and copy,cut,select:

  • C-L C-c 'm' : Copy jump area
    • | C-L C-c means type C-L then continue type C-c
  • C-L C-x 'm' : Cut jump area
  • C-L C-s 'm' : Select jump area
  • C-L C-f 'm' : Basic Jump alias

Copy without selection:

  • C-c w : Copy word
  • C-c s : Copy string
  • C-c l : Copy line
  • C-c b : Copy block between balanced { and }
  • C-c q : Copy quoted, such as abcd in "abcd"
  • C-c a : Copy to line beginning
  • C-c A : Copy to file beginning
  • C-c e : Copy to line end
  • C-c E : Copy to file end
  • C-c p : Copy paragraph
  • C-c ' ' (w | s | l | q | a | A | e | E | p) : Type one space to cut related area
  • C-c ' ' ' ' (w | s | l | q | a | A | e | E | p) : Type two space to select related area
